name: Super Mario 2D Land Fix
overview: Here is a full ROM hack for Super Mario World which was entered for the C3 contest on the SMWCentral site. Length: 87 exit(s) Difficulty: Normal Story: Help Me Mario! I am trapped in Bowser’s Castle. Bowser is even more dangerous this time. He has hire his troops and this time Bowser has been helped by Captain K. Rool. He has sent his powerful enemies against you Mario! Can Mario save the Princess and defeat Bowser and his army? Good Luck & Have Fun!!!!!!!!!!!!
